    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Nesmiselna poved</string>
            <string language="en">Sentence without sense</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmsatz ohne Richtung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Phrase sans sens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sentença sem sentido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frase senza senso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόταση χωρίς αίσθηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sentencia sin sentido</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Nesmiselne povedi ni lahko napisati, ko pa se enkrat začne, je zabave zvrhan koš. Ulnilist lahko natisnete (potrebno je narediti prostor za pisanje) ali pa ga lahko učenec dopolnjuje z računalnikom. Izdelek lahko še dodatno okrasi s sličicami. Naloga je primerna tudi za utrjevanje uporabe urejevalnika besedil.</string>
            <string language="en">Imagining sentences that make no sense can be a great fun.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">urejevalnik besedil</string>
            <string language="en">word processor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">stavek</string>
            <string language="en">sentence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">domišljija</string>
            <string language="en">imagination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">smisel</string>
            <string language="en">sense</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmsätze sich vorzustellen, die kein 
sinnvoll sind, kann ein großer Spaß sein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Imaginer les phrases qui ne semblent aucun 
raisonnable peut être un grand amusement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imaginar as sentenças que não fazem nenhum 
sentido pode ser um divertimento grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'immaginazione delle frasi che non hanno 
significato può essere un divertimento grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η φαντασία των προτάσεων που δεν έχουν κανένα νόημα 
μπορεί να είναι μια μεγάλη διασκέδαση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imaginar las sentencias que no tienen ningún 
sentido puede ser una gran diversión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textverarbeitungsgerät</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmsatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phantasie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
